website_summaries.verdict: A popular mechanical eyebrow liner by a top drugstore brand that works well for consumers who have fine, sparse brows and want to create a natural look.
pros: Has a slim point that can be used to pencil in fine hairs
Colors look natural on most brows
Easy to find a matching shade for most consumers
Mechanical pencil has a built-in spoolie brush
cons: The downside of the fine tip is that it's prone to breakage if you push too hard
Colors aren't very pigmented, and fade throughout the day for some wearers

customer_reviews.title: My go to eye brow pencil!
customer_reviews.text: I love this I go between this and the Maybelline version. I do hair and make up for weddings. And this color works for everyone except for people with black hair. My hair is platinum blonde and this works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole McOmber

customer_reviews.title: Good product and great value
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy the Lancôme version of these for $26 a pop until I found out that Lancôme and Cover Girl are owned buy the same company and these are virtually identical to the more expensive version. Both are made in Germany. The colors re good - I use the soft brown - they last a fairly long time, are easy to use successfully and are available almost everywhere. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Sally W.

customer_reviews.title: Hair-blonde,white or Grey this the one for you
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and am a repeat buyer. The blonde colors do not have red tint, which is hard to find. Downside: No extra pencil inserts so the holder is wasteful.
customer_reviews.author: averageanne

customer_reviews.title: Most realistic, love it!  Ordered two more.
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it looks more natural than any eyebrow product I’ve used. My eyebrows, like my mother’s, are thinning, and most eyebrow pencils look like I’ve used a crayon. I also am a blonde, and this is a nice, lighter shade, but dark enough to be realistic. If I had any complaint at all it would be that it doesn’t last quite as long as the last one I had, but I love it so much more. I have ordered a total of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Best pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyebrow pencil... it’s fine tipped, doesn’t break easy like some others and defines my eye brows nicely... I can almost use it alone.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Great for a coarse brow / natural look!
customer_reviews.text: I have coarse eyebrows, and I’m VERY picky about brow product. I also have trichotillomania (worth a google search if you’re unfamiliar) so natural looking brow product is KEY to my daily life, and has been for many years. I had used bareminerals ultra thin brow pencil (universal light) for 6 years... but the product changed and I started looking for a new one. Took many tries... but this one is IT. For a fraction of the price I used to pay. Most natural-looking, and the pencil is not too hard, not to soft. I tried the soft brown and I’m in love. I recommend giving it a try! It’s my new go-to. Hope this was helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CoffeeLade

customer_reviews.title: Not Sure
customer_reviews.text: This may or may not be authentic, crayon is hard when pressed against the face. Not sure I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: justnc

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Brow Pencil
customer_reviews.text: This brow pencil is better than those that are 3 times more expensive (Benefit and It Cosmetics). I heard about this product from Kelly Strack on YouTube. This is my go to brow product. I love that it’s so small because you can really get in there and define what you want to. Soft Brown is perfect- more ashy and no red in it.
customer_reviews.author: Livin'Southern

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend if you can find the right color for you!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this pencil for awhile now... repurchased several times. First time buying from Amazon though. I love that I can have this auto shipped because i can go through brow pencils pretty quickly (this one usually last me about 2 weeks or a little more). East to use and great price! Would recommend if you can find the correct color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah H

customer_reviews.title: Nice fine tip and great quality
customer_reviews.text: The best eyebrow pencil I have found so far at this price point. It stays on well, has a small fine point and isn't super slick so it doesn't smear around.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: My Go To Brow Pencil!
customer_reviews.text: I am very picky about brow pencils and this is my holy grail. It reminds me of the MAC brow pencil in Stud. I hate waxy brow pencils because they don't give you as much control and can leave you with a very heavy brow. This pencil allows for clean lines and definition. You can create hair-like strokes. It's also the perfect color. A lot of drugstore brow pencils in dark brown run red. I'm black, my hair is a cool brown, not a red brown. This is the perfect dark brown. I recommend it to all my friends and they love it as well. I don't plan on changing brow products anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on sensitive skin and colors eyebrows well
customer_reviews.text: Love how my brows look and my church congregation now knows I have eyebrows in the back of the church. The congregation couldn’t see them before because they were too light to see. I have sensitive skin and this product did not irritate at all. Thank you for such a gentle and great product.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen P

customer_reviews.title: Perfect universal color. (Soft brown)
customer_reviews.text: I am blonde, so I tried the two lighter colors that had blonde in the name, but both were quite red! I don't know what they were thinking. No one's eyebrows are that color except redheads. But the Soft Brown is a nice neutral, taupe-ish color that looks very natural. Love how precise you can get, and the brush on the end is great for blending and softening.
customer_reviews.author: saus131

customer_reviews.title: Go to eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to eyebrow pencil. Stays on really well. You can easily make fine lines. Easy to go dark and thick or light and natural. For the price, it's the best eyebrow pencil I have used in the past five years. Good color selection as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyebrow product. Best for natural looking brows!! Maybelline has a similar one but it smudges way to easy. This one is the best one I’ve tried
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Young

customer_reviews.title: The perfect pencil for naturally blonde brows
customer_reviews.text: I have found it is hard to find a good eyebrow pencil for naturally light eyebrows. This is the perfect color for blonde brows. I love the fine point and find it very easy to apply. I finally have eyebrows again! This is now a must have item in my makeup case.
customer_reviews.author: avidshopper

customer_reviews.title: Same as the store
customer_reviews.text: This is the same as the one I get at the store. It draws on with a very light touch so I can make hair lines. I've tried several shades and this is the best looking one for my light auburn hair. It could be more brown but I use a light touch to get the look I want.
customer_reviews.author: HS Mom

customer_reviews.title: WORTHLESS!
customer_reviews.text: The pencil on this is so thin, it breaks off almost immediately upon first use. Try the Almay pencil instead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good. A face crayon.
customer_reviews.text: There's no way this blunt wax pencil could fill in brows naturally. It's horrible. It's way too blunt to create the look of fine hairs. Compared to IT Cosmetics brow builder or even to a basic brow pencil you can sharpen, it's easy breezy garbage.
customer_reviews.author: epheme

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrow pencil fills in eyebrows and/or covers grey hair
customer_reviews.text: It is a thin eyebrow pencil, so it offers thin lines matching real hair. I wore it yesterday to an outdoor restaurant and my friend thought my eyebrows were natural and looked great. Easy to apply the pencil, then use brush to brush eyebrows in upward direction. I woke up this morning and eyebrows still looked great. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a Rock and Unusable
customer_reviews.text: Nope, the pencil I received is not good at all. I only kept it for the brush at the end which does work nicely. Try WetnWild Kohl "Taupe of the Morning" for a really good blonde brow and eye pencil
customer_reviews.author: GiGi

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in the shade soft brown however, it was an ash grey color. Bought this same pencil from Ulta and it was the correct soft brown shade. This is a great brow pencil but not sure this one is authentic.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Actual Dark Brown- No Red
customer_reviews.text: I have alopecia that is affecting ONE of my eyebrows right now, so I have purchased a ton of brow pencils in the last year to try and find an actual match to my other, dark brown, eyebrow. This is the only I’ve found that goes on thin and smooth and is actually dark brown, with no red! It’s a perfect match and stays on all day.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Pickle

customer_reviews.title: My Go-To Eyebrow Pencil
customer_reviews.text: Love not having to sharpen this eyebrow pencil. Creates nice, fine lines that make my brows look natural. Staying power is medium but that's okay because I reapply it each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jane R

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good eyebrow pencil for the price. Wanna c how it did go to my YouTube channel Melissa Trenchfield and look for my eyebrow tutorial
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Brow-mazing!
customer_reviews.text: I’m tired of spending so much on high end brow products so I tried this and wow! I am definitely impressed. Perfect glide and pigment and the shade match is great!
customer_reviews.author: MsMouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: Easy brezzy Brow.
customer_reviews.text: Color was right. but it did not last anytime. I tried to be a light as possible and the pencil still broke. Won't be buying it again.
customer_reviews.author: Islandgirl1647

customer_reviews.title: Everyday Solution
customer_reviews.text: I use this product daily but it's sometimes hard to find so I've stocked up as not to run out. Plus the prices are less so that's an advantage for me!
customer_reviews.author: LadyFrogg

customer_reviews.title: Color does not transfer, very waxy
customer_reviews.text: I bought the darkest shade and it is Bad. The color would not transfer on my skin, very waxy. I gave it a couple of chances until it ended up in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Belinda Torrez

customer_reviews.title: Eyebrows
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and how it glides on. Hate the retractable part. Wish it was a regular pencil.
customer_reviews.author: D E

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely my favorite brow pencil. Very fine and precise, goes on easily but without being too creamy or crumpling. Easy to do whispy lines more like microblading.
customer_reviews.author: Laura2928

customer_reviews.title: Finally cruelty free!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad Covergirl finally went cruelty free! I usually use Anastasia Brow Wiz, but even with all of her color selection, I have yet to find a perfect match. This is the right color for my ash blonde hair. The formula is excellent, and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: A. Black

customer_reviews.title: My new go to...
customer_reviews.text: Just love this product. Goes on very easy and stays on. Only problem for me is I found the soft brown a bit too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect eyebrow pencil at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great eyebrow pencil, has a fine line that never needs sharpening and is a good color, not too light and not too dark.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hockman

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: The product is pretty dry. And I only used for ten days, it already gone. I bought it because the price is really cheap, but I guess so does the product itself. Won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new go to brow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I was using the loreal brow stylist until I came across this, which is 3 dollars cheaper for the same amount of product.
customer_reviews.author: Amran Hizam

customer_reviews.title: Great for blondes!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to work with. I don’t really use the comb on the other side though. I have a spoolie (sp?) I use instead.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: I will buy these again.
customer_reviews.text: I like these pencils. You need to use a light touch as they are very thin and easily broken. They don’t last very long either. But they make a nice thin mark and work well For me
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The color is a good match and it goes on smooth. Even in the heat, it never runs. I like that it's not a pencil that needs sharpening.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great and looked great. Worked much better than the product I got at a more expensive store.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Love the fine tip!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve found that I really like fine tipped brow pencils. They are easy to fill in without looking too thick. This pencil is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brow pencil- misleading quantity description
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for over a year now and absolutely love it! The only reason I’m giving 1 star in value is because I ordered the option for a 2 pack and I only received one brow pencil.

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: This brow liner is perfect! I used to buy an expensive brow liner from Clinique but decided to give this one a whirl. My brows are light brown and just need a little color to fill in. Just as good as the more expensive product.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eyebrow pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyebrow pencil! Small enough so strokes look natural

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a similar version (Nyx) but I like this one better.

customer_reviews.title: Brow liner
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I have used them for quite a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Honey Manahan

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love that it’s retractable and has a brush on the end. It glides nicely too.

customer_reviews.title: quickly. To use
customer_reviews.text: Goes on nicely and stays on. But very little in the pencil, runs out quicklu.
customer_reviews.author: katiebird

customer_reviews.title: Good product, good value
customer_reviews.text: I love the color & the ease of use! It blends well & stays on all day!
customer_reviews.author: Carli Henrotay

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting color.
customer_reviews.text: This goes on easily and stays on most of the day.
customer_reviews.author: stephanie schwenk

customer_reviews.title: My everyday brow pencil
customer_reviews.text: My everyday brow pencil, love this one! Does the job great!
customer_reviews.author: Mary-Ann

customer_reviews.title: Easy, breezy, beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Nice shade. It’s my go to brow pencil.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: A+.
customer_reviews.text: The best in my opinion, but does run out fairly quick.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Best out there!!
customer_reviews.text: Best brow product on the market, better then UD, Benifit, ABH. Pigmented, stays put, waterproof and a nice smooth small tip to make perfect tiny hair strokes.
customer_reviews.author: sophia maria

customer_reviews.title: Always pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this item twice and have always been happy with it. It doesn't leave my browns too dark but provides good shape. It is an easy tool to work work with for filling in brows.
customer_reviews.author: Alley

customer_reviews.title: Good Price.
customer_reviews.text: What I Iiked about it is the fine point and you don't have to sharpen the pencil. Also, it was the perfect shade of brown that I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Martin

customer_reviews.title: Finishes too Fast
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyebrow pencil, but it runs out pretty quickly!
customer_reviews.author: S.C

customer_reviews.title: Great tip
customer_reviews.text: Super precise tip helps me get the angle I want. So great I have it on a scheduled reorder.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Love the liner. It's the best out there.
customer_reviews.text: This is by far my absolute favorite eyebrow pencil. Seems it's a bit smaller than normal but I still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Hanson

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Color matches perfectly and it doesn't look ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I love it! Color matches perfectly and it doesn't look like I have sharpie eyebrows. Plus it came with two, which is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: love this pencil
customer_reviews.text: i love this pencil and the color is perfect. it's a nice fine tip and is soft and super easy to apply.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: My favorite brow pencil!
customer_reviews.text: Love this brow pencil! I have light and very sparse eyebrows and am able to get a perfect amount of color and thickness from this pencil. Looks natural and stays on.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great color!
customer_reviews.text: I thought I'd never find a color that matches with my eyebrows, the deep brown looks very natural and warm. Happy I gave it a try.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Z

customer_reviews.title: Get it
customer_reviews.text: What a nice little tool! The color comes on just enough.. not too much or too dark . Half the price of the drug stores . The brush on the end is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Michele Bissell

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for filling in brows, however tough to get it to create fine lines.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Love this brow pencil
customer_reviews.text: This is better value for its money than the Anastasia Brow Wiz
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Translation

customer_reviews.title: The best brow pencil I’ve found
customer_reviews.text: This will be my new go-to brow pencil. The color is the perfect shade of ashy brown and the thin pencil makes a natural look easy to achieve.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Best brow pencil ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my fave eyebrow pencil. I’ve tried so many and always come back to this. It’s perfect

customer_reviews.title: Great eyebrow pencil!
customer_reviews.text: Best eyebrow pencil ever. It is micro, so you can define each hair.

customer_reviews.title: My go to...
customer_reviews.text: My go to brow pencil, easy to use and not too dark in the skin.
customer_reviews.author: A.coral.m

customer_reviews.title: Best I've used
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color, was looking for a warm brown without red tones and this one delivered. The pencil thickness is also perfect; thin enough and strong enough not to break off during use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color for matching my skin tone and blonde hair but this barely lasts 2 weeks. 😢
customer_reviews.author: Nina A.

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: The price was great for this item. The Covergirl eyebrow pencil is usually $9.00 + for just one. Such a great deal and was delivered promptly with prime!

customer_reviews.title: I'll Never Buy Anything Else but This
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, goes on smoothly. The little brush on the one end works well for blending. Great color

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t get any better
customer_reviews.text: Best brow pencil ever!! Do yourself a favor and buy it... thank me later

customer_reviews.title: Awesome brow liner
customer_reviews.text: My go-to brow pen, I cant find it at my cvs store so I get it from Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love the little precise pencil that’s mechanical I love it!

customer_reviews.title: As good as BrowZing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this in place of Benefit's Browzing and am just as happy for a fraction of the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Comparable with the Anastasia brow pencil. Such a great dupe and value!

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this
customer_reviews.text: This has the perfect undertones. I’ve tried many many brow products pencils, palm aids and powders. Target one line is cheaper.

customer_reviews.title: Packaging was already opened when I got it
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the amazon box the eyebrow pencil packaging was already ripped open on the top and the tip of the pencil was smushed
customer_reviews.author: Neil shirttag

customer_reviews.title: Purchased two pencils  received one pencil
customer_reviews.text: I love this pencil but I paid for two pencils and received two packages but one pencil

customer_reviews.title: Good price point
customer_reviews.text: A good buy price wise and almost as good as the $25 brand.
customer_reviews.author: CACW

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Stays on all day even if I sweat. Easily washes off. Will use nothing else.
customer_reviews.author: DK

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Very useful brush. Pencil works best for me for filling in spots the brow mascara missed, or drawing in missing brow hairs.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Burrell

customer_reviews.title: Best eyebrow pencil I've used
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many other brands but cover girl stays on the longest, goes on easily, and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Great price, got it FAST and I love it. Great color, easy to apply, now I have eyebrows!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Watson

customer_reviews.title: Love it 😍 always a Covergirl
customer_reviews.text: Great color , easy to use , Great Value for the price

customer_reviews.title: Not delivered on February 1rst
customer_reviews.text: The product is great I use it all the time. Was promised it would be delivered on the 1rst and it wasn’t.

customer_reviews.title: Best pencil by far!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite need to order another Best for defining eyebrows!
customer_reviews.author: Nichelle

customer_reviews.title: Things Made Right
customer_reviews.text: Literally received the packaging without the product, within 2 days had a brand new one 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ciarletta

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love
customer_reviews.text: I love how thin and precise the point is. It blends well but does not smear like many of the others. I feel like my eyebrows stay looking just like I want all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Fills in my eyebrows perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eyebrow pencil I've found. I Love it! I make sure to always keep an extra one on hand. I don't ever want to run out!
customer_reviews.author: Jeni Golden

customer_reviews.title: Not true to the color
customer_reviews.text: Not the same color as the original honey brown. More like a medium brown. A bit disappointing.

customer_reviews.title: Natural look
customer_reviews.text: Love this brow pencil. Usually use dip brow or wonderbrow but this is my new go to. It looks so natural!

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Doesn't leave globs of product on eyebrow hairs.

customer_reviews.title: Good product

customer_reviews.text: I like the fine point, and the blending brush. It is just the right color for me. Light soft taupe, blonde.

product_meta.title: COVERGIRL Easy Breezy Brow Micro-Fine + Define Pencil, Soft Brown, 0.03 Pound (packaging may vary)
product_meta.description: Color:SOFT BROWN| Size:Pack of 1For beautiful brows that last all day, try COVERGIRL Easy Breezy Brow Micro-Fine + Define Pencil. A micro-fine tip means no sharpening required and a built-in spoolie will help you groom your brows into a full, naturally defined pair. From soft blonde to rich brown, this brow definer is available in multiple shades.
feature_bullets: Built in spoolie with micro-fine tip
Removes easily with soap and water

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
